sentences.sentence: Equilibrate all material to the temperature at which the chromatography will be performed.
sentences.translation: 将所有材料平衡至进行层析的温度。

sentences.sentence: First, the formation may not supply enough fluid in a short enough time to equilibrate with the tester.
sentences.translation: 首先，地层不可能在很短的时间内提供足的液体，以便和测试器取得平衡。

sentences.sentence: Sodium concentration and osmolality in the intravascular and interstitial Spaces equilibrate across the vascular membrane.
sentences.translation: 钠离子浓度和血管内渗透压以及组织间隙渗透压通过血管膜保持平衡。
